explains: n. 灌输；浸泡；注入物；激励
wordGroup: fluid infusion 补液，输液；点滴注射
infusion pump 输液泵，抽液泵；灌流泵
capital infusion 资本输入；扩充资本

sentences.en: The rapid expansion in international trade also benefitted from an infusion of capital, stemming largely from gold and silver brought by Spanish vessels from the Americas.
sentences.cn: 国际贸易的迅速扩张也得益于资本的注入，主要起源于西班牙船只从美洲带来的金银。

sentences.en: He brought a tremendous infusion of hope to the people.
sentences.cn: 他给人们带来极大的希望。

sentences.en: Tisane is an herbal infusion not made from the leaves of the tea bush.
sentences.cn: 草药茶是一种不是由茶树的叶子制成的草药浸液。
